pkgmetadata.longdescription: Call Optimization Solvers with .nl Files // The purpose of this library is to to call different optimization solvers (such as Gonzalez Rodriguez et al. (2022) doi:10.1007/s10898-022-01229-w, Tawarmalani and Sahinidis (2005) doi:10.1007/s10107-005-0581-8, and Byrd et al. (2006) doi:10.1007/0-387-30065-1_4) to solve problems given by a standard nl file.
